trans-unit.source: Provides a set of static methods to gain access to related information and functionality.
trans-unit.target: 提供一组静态方法以获取对相关的信息和功能的访问。

trans-unit.source: Purges the current durable service instance from memory after the operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 完成操作后，请从内存中清除当前持久性服务实例。

trans-unit.source: This method call will fail unless the `ConcurrencyMode` value for your service is set to `Single` and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute.SaveStateInOperationTransaction%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用将失败，除非`ConcurrencyMode`值你的服务设置为`Single`和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute.SaveStateInOperationTransaction%2A>设置为`false`。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute.SaveStateInOperationTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unloads the durable service instance from memory and deletes it from persistence after the operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 持久性服务实例从内存卸载并将其删除从持久性存储中，完成操作后。

trans-unit.source: Gets the service ID of this service instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取此服务实例的服务 ID。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that contains the ID of the service.
